sentence.Network_en: Augury is the important part of Chinese traditional culture.
sentence.Network_cn: 占卜是中国传统文化中的一个重要组成部分。

sentence.Network_en: The maritime passage was a good augury for the aerial passage.
sentence.Network_cn: 顺利的航海仿佛也是航空的好预兆.

sentence.Network_en: Still others believe it is a superstitious book augury.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多人认为《周易》一部占卜的书,算命有关,涉嫌“迷信”.

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... revoke 取消） ② 表示“使….成为，进入” augury 预兆） Mrs.Malaprop, 以用词错误闻名）.

list.abs: He hoped it was an augury ., 他希望这是一个征兆.
we were warned . but when the worst recession in seven decades smacked us in the face , all the gruesome auguries did little to dull the pain .美国事先得到了警告，但是七十年来最糟糕的经济衰退重创了美国，所有可怕的预言都未能减弱痛苦。
this is not a happy augury for the interval between these elections and the next .在这些选举的间隔中这不是一个快乐的征兆。
咖啡占卜(coffee augury)(2006-07-28 18:28:40) 转载▼分类: 咖啡物语咖啡占卜的由来咖啡占卜,全名又称为“希腊咖啡占卜”,或是“土耳其咖啡占卜”。曾经受.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense divination): from Old French augurie or Latin augurium 'interpretation of omens', from augur (see augur)

entry.def: An augury is a sign of what will happen in the future.

example.ex: The auguries of death are fast gathering round his head.
example.tran: 死亡凶兆迅速地在他脑海中盘旋。

means.word_mean: 1. an event that is experienced as indicating important things to come;

auth_sentence.content: That, too, might be an augury for British politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: That, too, might be an augury for British politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That, too, might be an augury for British politics.

auth_sentence.content: The ruling was a bad enough blow for the NYPD in its own right, but it is even more disturbing as an augury of things to come.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ruling was a bad enough blow for the NYPD in its own right, but it is even more disturbing as an augury of things to come.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ruling was a bad enough blow for the NYPD in its own right, but it is even more disturbing as an augury of things to come.

auth_sentence.content: We've tried almost everything and everyone -- prophets, augury, palmists, cards, bones and stock analysts.
auth_sentence.res_content: We've tried almost everything and everyone -- prophets, augury, palmists, cards, bones and stock analysts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We've tried almost everything and everyone -- prophets, augury, palmists, cards, bones and stock analysts.

stems_affixes.word_buile: aug增加+ury→[使事态扩大]的预兆
aug增加+ust→八月为水果等丰收的结节
auct=aug增加+ion动作或状态→[价钱]扩大→拍卖
aug增加+ment→v.[使]增大,增加,增长,扩张
